MACROKEYBINDS.Instructions: Press key combination, Delete/Backspace to clear. Supports modifier keys (Ctrl, Alt, Shift)
MACROKEYBINDS.Label: Keybind
MACROKEYBINDS.NoticeWillApply: Keybind will be applied when macro is saved
MACROKEYBINDS.NotificationApplied: Keybind {keybind} applied to macro {name}. Reload to activate.
MACROKEYBINDS.NotificationSaved: Keybind saved. Reload page to apply changes.
MACROKEYBINDS.NotificationWillApply: Keybind will be applied when macro is saved
MACROKEYBINDS.SettingHint: Disable the default 1-0 number keys for the macro hotbar.
MACROKEYBINDS.UpdatedName: Updated macro name in keybinds to {name}
